name: Ludum Dare 42 - Team Entry
description:
Ludum Dare 42 Entry for Team.

You are Robert Raccoon,  and you have fine taste (despite being a trash panda) in Art. Security Cameras make your trip across the art gallery tricky, as Space is Running Out (the theme). Dodge them and grab a nice Van Gopher, and get outta there!

https://github.com/nikolajbaer/ldjam42

Made by Kevin Mooney and Nikolaj Baer (me!)

with Godot 3.0.6
